Posts.Content:
Hi there and welcome to HealingWell!
Although I'm kinda new here as well, I was just thinking that maybe you could start a forum here on Kidney Disease and I bet
you'd get a ton of responses. I honestly don't know how to do that here, maybe check with one of the Moderators?
I hope you get answers soon!!
~ Julie
Posts.Title: Nephrectomy anyone?
